metadata.title: CVE-2018-12983 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer over-read in thePdfEncryptMD5Base::ComputeEncryptionKey() function in PdfEncrypt.cpp inPoDoFo 0.9.6-rc1 could be leveraged by remote attackers to cause adenial-of-service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
